dialogue.text:
"I fought the Rubian and I lost, and now I am imprisoned in the very gate that blocks my path, my body desecrated. However, my old clothing has holy power within. If you can return the clothing to my body, I should be able to open the gate. Please hurry! 
- Sharen III 

P.S. I know this is rather picky of me, but can you please return the clothes to my body #bbottom to top#k? Thank you for your services."
